tool_description: Astrology API | Get Horoscope, Panchang and Kundali
name: Horoscope and Panchanga
title: Horoscope and Panchanga

api_list.name: Zodiac Sign Matching
Zodiac Sign Prediction
Panchang Summary
api_list.description: The Panchangam Summary API returns Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, Sunrise, Sunset, Moonrise, Moonset. These fields provide a comprehensive overview of the Hindu Panchang for the given date, including important astrological events and timings. By using this API, individuals and businesses can easily retrieve accurate Panchang summary data for their desired date without the need for manual calculations.

api_list.name: Panchang
api_list.description: The Panchang API returns Hindu Panchangam details for a given date. The following fields are included in the JSON response: Tithi, Nakshatra ,Yoga, Karana, Sunrise, Sunset, Rahu Kaal, Yama Gandam, Gulika Kalam , Muhurtham. These fields provide a comprehensive overview of the Hindu Panchangam for the specified date, including important astrological events and timings. By using this API, individuals and businesses can easily retrieve accurate Panchang data for their desired date without the need for manual calculations.

api_list.name: Horoscope / Birth Chart
api_list.description: The Horoscope API allows you to create a full featured horoscope websites or mobile applications which has kundli or horoscope detailed calculations based on the given birth date, time and place.
